```{r}

data("PlantGrowth")

head(PlantGrowth)
str(PlantGrowth)
```
```{r}
# Mean by group
mean_by_group <- aggregate(weight ~ group, data = PlantGrowth, mean)

# Median by group
median_by_group <- aggregate(weight ~ group, data = PlantGrowth, median)

# Combine into one table
stats_table <- data.frame(
  group = mean_by_group$group,
  mean = mean_by_group$weight,
  median = median_by_group$weight
)

stats_table
```
```{r}
boxplot(weight ~ group, data = PlantGrowth,
        main = "Plant Weight by Group",
        xlab = "Group",
        ylab = "Weight")
```
